item.title: Spotify 第二季度出现亏损，业绩未达预期
item.description: 音乐流媒体服务公司 Spotify Technology SA 第二季度出现亏损，低于分析师的预期，原因是与员工薪酬相关的支出高于预期。【原文：Spotify Technology SA swung to a loss in the second quarter, missing analysts’ estimates after the music-streaming service recorded higher-than-expected expenses related to employee compensation.】

item.title: 沙普尔吉获得 RBI 豁免，避免私人债务收益率上升
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度 Shapoorji Pallonji 集团已从银行监管机构获得了一项关键的监管豁免，减轻了其 34 亿美元私人信贷交易的压力，避免了借款成本的增加。【原文：India’s Shapoorji Pallonji Group has secured a key regulatory waiver from the banking regulator, easing pressure on its landmark $3.4 billion private credit deal and averting an increase in the cost of that borrowing, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说依维柯接近与莱昂纳多和塔塔签订国防和商业合同
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，依维柯集团（Iveco Group NV）即将达成一项交易，将其防务部门出售给莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo SpA），并将商用卡车业务出售给印度塔塔汽车公司（Tata Motors Ltd.）。【原文：Iveco Group NV is nearing a deal to sell its defense unit to Leonardo SpA and the commercial trucking business to India’s Tata Motors Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 联合健康发布低于华尔街预期的最新指导性报告
item.description: 联合健康集团公司（UnitedHealth Group Inc.【原文：UnitedHealth Group Inc. set a new earnings target below Wall Street’s estimates for the year, another sign of difficulty for the health-care giant as it tries to regain investors’ confidence.】

item.title: IPhone制造商鸿海的股票在披露信息前停牌
item.description: 在披露市场敏感信息之前，鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.’s shares have been suspended from trading ahead of the disclosure of market-sensitive information, an unusual move that suggests an important announcement Wednesday.】

item.title: CaixaBank 正寻求出售约 9 亿欧元的不良贷款
item.description: 西班牙储蓄银行（CaixaBank SA）正在与投资者洽谈出售约 9 亿欧元（10.4 亿美元）的不良贷款，因为这家西班牙贷款机构正在加速清理其资产负债表。【原文：CaixaBank SA is in talks with investors to sell about €900 million ($1.04 billion) in soured loans as the Spanish lender accelerates the clean-up of its balance sheet.】

item.title: 三得利首席执行官称日本央行 "必须提高利率
item.description: 三得利控股有限公司（Suntory Holdings Ltd.）首席执行官兼日本企业高管协会（Japan Association of Corporate Executives）主席新南武（Takeshi Niinami）表示，日本央行应在本周政策委员会会议上提高利率，否则将削弱日元并加剧通胀。【原文：Japan’s central bank should raise rates when its policy board meets this week, and failure to do so will weaken the yen and exacerbate inflation, said Takeshi Niinami, chief executive officer of Suntory Holdings Ltd. and chair of the Japan Association of Corporate Executives.】

item.title: 新加坡董事在庞氏骗局后需承担 6.54 亿美元的赔偿责任
item.description: 高等法院裁定，资不抵债的 Envy 集团公司的两名前董事应对投资者在镍币交易骗局和新加坡有史以来最大的庞氏骗局中损失的多达 6.54 亿美元负责。【原文：Two former directors of the insolvent Envy Group of companies are liable to investors for as much as $654 million lost in a nickel-trading scam and Singapore’s largest-ever Ponzi scheme, the High Court ruled.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯开发商 3.36 亿美元首次公开募股数分钟内售罄
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士称，沙特阿拉伯 Dar Al Majed 房地产公司在利雅得首次公开发行 12.6 亿里亚尔（约合 3.36 亿美元）的股票，在开盘后几分钟内就出现了抢购潮。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s Dar Al Majed Real Estate Co. saw demand for all shares on offer in its 1.26 billion riyals ($336 million) initial public offering within minutes of books opening on the deal in Riyadh, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 这轮股市反弹取决于看涨的科技财报
item.description:
微软、Meta、苹果和亚马逊将在未来两天发布报告。【原文：

Microsoft, Meta, Apple and Amazon report over the next two days.

】

item.title: 估值攀升，华尔街坚持股票牛市论调
item.description: 华尔街策略师向投资者传达了一个信息，他们担心随着美股延续创纪录的上涨势头，会出现过度乐观的迹象：任何短期回调都可能创造买入机会。【原文：Wall Street strategists have a message for investors worrying about signs of excessive optimism emerging as US stocks extend their record run: Any near-term pullback will likely create a buying opportunity.】

item.title: 菲律宾顶级银行发行全国最大私人债券
item.description: BDO Unibank Inc. 从菲律宾最大的公司债券销售中筹集了 1,150 亿比索（20 亿美元）的资金，凸显了寻求有吸引力回报的投资者的强劲需求。【原文：BDO Unibank Inc. raised 115 billion pesos ($2 billion) from the Philippines’ largest corporate bond sale, highlighting strong demand from investors seeking attractive return.】

item.title: 一位年轻的 DOGE 程序员拆解美国体制的肖像
item.description:
卢克-法里托本可以成为一名艺术家、一名建筑师，或者一名致力于揭开伟大历史谜团的人。相反，他却在政府效率部工作，大肆砍伐、拆除、破坏。【原文：

Luke Farritor could have been an artist, or a builder, or someone dedicated to seeing a great historical mystery through. Instead he wound up at the Department of Government Efficiency, slashing, dismantling, undoing.

】

item.title: 税收上调后市场趋于稳定，英国抵押贷款申请量上升
item.description: 随着房地产市场继续摆脱 4 月份增税的影响，6 月份英国住房贷款开绿灯的数量升至三个月来的新高。【原文：The number of UK home loans given the green light rose to a three-month high in June, as the housing market continued to shake off the impact of April’s tax hike.】

item.title: 由于利润下降，Greggs 股价跌至自大流行病以来的最低点
item.description: Greggs Plc 的股价跌至 2020 年以来的最低点，因为这家英国连锁面包店报告今年上半年利润下降。【原文：Greggs Plc’s shares fell to the lowest since 2020 after the UK bakery chain reported a drop in profit in the first half of the year.】

item.title: 匈牙利大选前困境重重，大幅下调经济增长预测
item.description: 匈牙利政府大幅下调了经济增长预期，这凸显了匈牙利总理维克托-欧尔班（Viktor Orban）在重新执政以来最艰难的大选前所面临的日益严峻的经济挑战。【原文：Hungary’s government sharply reduced its growth forecast, underscoring the mounting economic challenges facing Prime Minister Viktor Orban before the toughest election since his return to power.】

item.title: 美国银行预计到 2027 年底南非将实现通胀目标
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America）表示，南非可能会在 2027 年底前逐步降低 3% 的通胀目标，这有可能导致官方利率降至 6% 以下。【原文：South Africa’s move to a lower 3% inflation target may be phased in by the end of 2027, potentially resulting in official interest rates moderating to below 6%, Bank of America said.】

item.title: 美国重要数据公布前美元创五周最强水平
item.description: 美元指数升至五个多星期以来的最强水平，原因是人们猜测美国公布的一系列数据将进一步显示出经济复苏的迹象。【原文：A gauge of the dollar rose to its strongest level in more than five weeks on speculation a slew of US data releases will offer further signs of economic resilience.】

item.title: 盎格鲁集团南非铁矿石部门称铁路故障趋于稳定
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）的南非铁矿石业务部门称，负责运输其铁矿石的国有物流公司已经遏制了业绩恶化，这限制了该矿商的销售。【原文：Anglo American Plc’s South African iron ore unit said the state-owned logistics company which transports its output has stemmed a deterioration in performance that’s constrained the miner’s sales.】

item.title: 菲律宾央行行长预计 8 月再次降息
item.description: 菲律宾央行行长伊莱-雷莫洛纳（Eli Remolona）表示，在通胀放缓的背景下，菲律宾央行将考虑在 8 月份举行的下一次政策会议上降低关键利率。【原文：The Philippine central bank will consider lowering its key interest rate at its next policy meeting in August, according to Governor Eli Remolona, against a backdrop of slower inflation.】

item.title: 内幕交易团伙被指追求未来的罗斯柴尔德银行家
item.description: 在内幕交易调查中出现了一个新的转折，法国当局正在调查一个网络，据称该网络试图拉拢精英大学生和初级银行家，赌他们有朝一日会获得顶级金融职位并交出影响市场的情报。【原文：In a novel twist on insider trading probes, French authorities are investigating a network that allegedly tried to court elite university students and junior bankers, betting they’d one day land top finance jobs and hand over market-moving intelligence.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称 6 月消费者通胀预期放缓
item.description: 欧洲中央银行称，欧元区消费者的通胀预期在 6 月份有所缓解。【原文：Inflation expectations of euro-area consumers eased in June, the European Central Bank said.】

item.title: 建筑商丽新寻求出售香港建行大厦 50% 的股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，丽新发展有限公司正在寻求出售其持有的香港写字楼建行大厦（CCB Tower）50%的股份，因为该建筑商正在寻求出售资产。【原文：Lai Sun Development Co. is seeking to sell its 50% stake in Hong Kong office building CCB Tower, according to people familiar with the matter, as the builder looks to shed assets.】

item.title: 高盛策略师 2024 年发出的 "跳出美股看美股 "的号召依然有效
item.description:
彼得-奥本海默（Peter Oppenheimer）是去年最早建议分散投资美国市场的人之一。【原文：

Peter Oppenheimer was among the first to recommend diversifying away from US last year.

】

item.title: 南非 FNB 银行着眼于在根西岛为富裕客户拓展业务
item.description: 南非市值最大的银行 FirstRand Ltd. 旗下的一个部门计划扩大其在根西岛的业务，以开拓更多来自高净值个人和居住在该岛的南非人的业务。【原文：A unit of South Africa’s biggest bank by market value, FirstRand Ltd., plans to expand its offerings in Guernsey to tap more business from high-net-worth individuals and South Africans living on the island.】

item.title: 埃及计划更多液化天然气交易，推动全球燃料竞争
item.description: 埃及准备在本十年末之前增加液化天然气的采购量，这将使全球市场趋紧，并引发更高的进口费用前景。【原文：Egypt is poised to boost liquefied natural gas purchases until the end of the decade, tightening the global market and raising the prospect of yet-higher import bills.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普引发贸易波动，西班牙经济仍保持强劲增长
item.description: 西班牙以消费者为主导的经济在本季度再次实现强劲扩张，显示出对唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策所造成的广泛贸易动荡的抵御能力。【原文：Spain’s consumer-led economy posted another strong quarter of expansion, showing resilience to the widespread trade turmoil inflicted by Donald Trump’s tariff policies.】

item.title: PUBG》制作公司卡夫通两年来利润首次下滑
item.description: 旗舰游戏《PUBG：Battlegrounds》的季节性放缓超过了其他产品的贡献，卡夫通公司的利润两年来首次出现下滑。【原文：Krafton Inc.’s profit fell for the first time in two years after a seasonal slowdown in flagship title PUBG: Battlegrounds outweighed contributions from other offerings.】

item.title: 野村因股票交易火爆而利润超预期
item.description: 野村控股公司（Nomura Holdings Inc.【原文：Nomura Holdings Inc.’s profit beat expectations last quarter, as the Japanese firm joined the equity trading boom that fueled earnings for Wall Street banks.】

item.title: 印度纳亚拉公司在欧盟制裁后降低原油加工率
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，纳亚拉能源公司正在降低其印度西部炼油厂的运行率，因为在欧盟实施制裁后，该公司在接收原油进口和出口加工燃料方面举步维艰。【原文：Nayara Energy is reducing run rates at its west India refinery as it struggles to receive crude imports and export processed fuels after EU-imposed sanctions, according to people familiar with the matter.】
